_header: For truth write this dream to thee
Subjects: prognostications; dreams, interpretation of; glosses; translations
_description: Couplets scattered in text of Bernardus Sylvestris, Experimentaris…

NYPL120.Transcription:
ffor treuþe write þis dreme to þeAnd after þe
                    maner as it is so shalbe
NYPL120.Note:
Added to right margin by original scribe, as a gloss beside Latin text
                    it translates.
